metadata.title: CVE-2023-28205 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in Safari 16.4.1, iOS 15.7.5 and iPadOS 15.7.5, iOS 16.4.1and iPadOS 16.4.1, macOS Ventura 13.3.1. Processing maliciously crafted webcontent may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a reportthat this issue may have been actively exploited.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
